text: Dear Benedict, thank you very much for sharing your knowledge with my son. Your engaging and enriching sessions in exploring unusual creativity are contemporary. This customized applied learning will stay with him for a very long time as he keeps sharing his experiences with families and friends. He looks forward to more sessions with you soon.

I adore Ben as an very inspiring artist who has such brilliant talents and creative mind.
i visited his new home and studio days ago.
tho everything is still waiting to be put into place, i believe this art studio will be an excellent place for him to continue his dedication to art.
